Wei Wise is the first crypto-focused Chrome extension that empowers users to navigate Ethereum gas prices efficiently and safely via machine learning technology.

HOW TO USE

Wei Wise is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive, making it easy to use even for those who are new to the world of Ethereum.

Here's how you can add the Wei Wise extension to Google Chrome (or Brave), monitor current Ethereum Gas Prices, Historical Gas, 1 Hour Gas Predictions and Add Alerts/Notifications that activate whenever the gas price falls below a specified threshold.

EFFORTLESS GAS TRACKING & MANAGEMENT

Elevate your Ethereum experience with real-time gas price tracking, historical analysis, and insightful predictions. Wei Wise's Chrome extension provides a smooth and user-friendly platform to help you handle your Ethereum transactions with ease and proficiency.

Step into a world of simplified and informed decision-making where your Ethereum gas management is smart, seamless, and straightforward.

REAL-TIME GAS PRICE MONITORING

Stay informed and ahead of the curve with Wei Wise. Our platform continuously fetches and updates the current gas prices from the Ethereum network, displaying them conveniently on your browser.

With Wei Wise, you are always equipped with the most accurate and current information, enabling you to strategize your transactions optimally.

PERSONALIZED GAS PRICE ALERTS

Make Wei Wise work for you. Our platform allows you to set your personalized thresholds for gas prices. Once the network gas prices fall below your determined level, Wei Wise will instantly alert you.

This ensures that you never miss out on a favorable transaction window and makes your Ethereum transactions more efficient and economical.

HISTORICAL GAS DATA AND PREDICTIVE ANALYTICS

Wei Wise takes you beyond real-time data. We provide comprehensive historical gas price trends that allow you to understand market patterns better.

Furthermore, our predictive analytics employ sophisticated algorithms to forecast potential future trends. By leveraging past data and future predictions, Wei Wise empowers you to make informed decisions about your Ethereum transactions

SECURE AND PRIVATE

At Wei Wise, your security and privacy are our paramount concerns. Our platform is designed in a way that it doesn't require any sensitive information from you, nor does it require access to your wallets.

With Wei Wise, you can confidently monitor and manage Ethereum gas prices knowing your data and wallets remain secure and private.
